text: The contents of your purse say so much about you. Are you an expert girl with agendas and recordsdata that take up the area of your satchel? Are you an avid shopper with receipts lining the underside of your bag? Are you a mother with moist wipes and juice bins tucked into the pockets? Based mostly on Khloe Kardashian ‘ s purse, she ’ s an excellent relatable mother that is ready to be on digicam at any given time. Though we have watched her glamorous way of life over the previous decade of Preserving Up With the Kardashians, you could be stunned by the star ’ s down - to - earth, day by day must - haves, which incorporates cures for migraines, stains and cling nails
